org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.base

Class RadioGroupBase<T>

  • Object
    • UIObject
      • Widget
        • Panel
          • ComplexPanel
            • FlowPanel
              • FlowPanel
                • RadioGroupBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return value type of the radio group.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Editor<T>, HasEditorErrors<T>, LeafValueEditor<T>, HasAttachHandlers, HasValueChangeHandlers<T>, HasHandlers, EventListener, TakesValue<T>, HasName, HasValue<T>, HasVisibility, HasWidgets, HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, IndexedPanel, IndexedPanel.ForIsWidget, InsertPanel, InsertPanel.ForIsWidget, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>, HasDataSpy, HasDataTarget, HasId, HasResponsiveness, HasErrorHandler, HasBlankValidator<T>, HasValidators<T>, ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanRadioGroup, DoubleRadioGroup, IntegerRadioGroup, StringRadioGroup

    public class RadioGroupBase<T>
extends FlowPanel
implements HasName, HasValue<T>, LeafValueEditor<T>, HasEditorErrors<T>, HasErrorHandler, HasValidators<T>, HasBlankValidator<T>
    Contains a group of radio input elements.
    Author:
    Steven Jardine
